channel.title: I dont know what sub-genre of EDM i am doing
channel.description:
Any time i come up with a song without getting inspiration from other songs(which is what i do most of the time).I just dont have any idea what sub-genre of edm it is so i still dont know what is my main genre in production.Is this normal? lol
And can you guys help me determine what genre these songs are? 1) https://soundcloud.com/user-123297002/rain-down-by-tornait-sylent-remix i said this is deep house but of course its not idk what genre this is 2) https://soundcloud.com/user-123297002/time-is-running-out this is also not deep house but wtf is this? 4) https://soundcloud.com/user-123297002/time-shift what is this??? 5) https://soundcloud.com/user-123297002/event-horizon idek? maybe progressive house? 6) https://soundcloud.com/user-123297002/paradise-sets i would say this is tropical house but it doesnt sound house
Thanks for taking your time

item.title: I dont know what sub-genre of EDM i am doing
item.dc:creator: Sylent
item.description:
You are right but i dont even think they sound house

Read full topic
item.source: I dont know what sub-genre of EDM i am doing

item.title: I dont know what sub-genre of EDM i am doing
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
Sylent:

Any time i come up with a song without getting inspiration from other songs(which is what i do most of the time).I just dont have any idea what sub-genre of edm it is so i still dont know what is my main genre in production.Is this normal? lol

And can you guys help me determine what genre these songs are?

  1. https://soundcloud.com/user-123297002/rain-down-by-tornait-sylent-remix
    i said this is deep house but of course its not idk what genre this is
  2. https://soundcloud.com/user-123297002/time-is-running-out
    this is also not deep house but wtf is this?
  3. https://soundcloud.com/user-123297002/time-shift
    what is this???
  4. https://soundcloud.com/user-123297002/event-horizon
    idek? maybe progressive house?
  5. https://soundcloud.com/user-123297002/paradise-sets
    i would say this is tropical house but it doesnt sound house

There is a pattern here. Maybe don’t worry too much about a sub-genre? People have a tendency to want to compartmentalize things (myself included) but more often than not it just causes more stress than it’s worth.

Read full topic
item.source: I dont know what sub-genre of EDM i am doing
